mapper.select:
SELECT ROWNUM, C.* FROM COMMUNITY C
ROWNUM <= 100
and com_category = #{com_category}
ORDER BY C.COM_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMUNITY ( MBR_ID, COM_CATEGORY, COM_TITLE, COM_CONTENT ) VALUES( #{mbr_id}, #{com_category}, #{com_title}, #{com_content} )
mapper.select:
SELECT ROWNUM, C.* FROM COMMUNITY_COM C
ROWNUM <= 100
and C.COM_NO = #{com_no} and C.CC_CATEGORY = '커뮤니티'
ORDER BY C.CC_NO DESC
mapper.insert:
select SEQ_COMMUNITY_COM_CC_NO.nextval FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO COMMUNITY_COM ( CC_NO, MBR_ID, CC_CONTENT, COM_NO, CC_CATEGORY ) VALUES( #{cc_no}, #{mbr_id}, #{cc_content}, #{com_no}, '커뮤니티' )
